thread.title: Burnley boss Sean Dyche defends stag do referee Anthony Taylor, despite he and Kevin Friend enduring shocking afternoons

author: dfraser
title: Burnley boss Sean Dyche defends stag do referee Anthony Taylor, despite he and Kevin Friend enduring shocking afternoons
text:
EFL Reffing hell Burnley boss Sean Dyche defends stag do referee Anthony Taylor, despite he and Kevin Friend enduring shocking afternoons 
Taylor and Friend made a catalogue of errors, with the latter failing to send of TWO players for horrific acts of violence By Graham Clutton 5th March 2017, 1:28 pm Updated: 5th March 2017, 1:35 pm Comments STAG-PARTY referee Anthony Taylor has been defended by Burnley boss Sean Dyche. 
Taylor, who spent three days earlier in the week on his do in Marbella, wrongly awarded the Clarets a penalty at Swansea’s Liberty Stadium. Reuters 4 Anthony Taylor endured a shocking afternoon during Swansea vs Burnley 
He accused Swans ’ Alfie Mawson of handling in the box when replays confirmed it was Burnley ’s Sam Vokes. 
Keep up to date with ALL the football news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary. 
On the Spain trip with Taylor was fellow ref Kevin Friend — who had a stinker at yesterday’s clash between Manchester United and Bournemouth . Anthony Taylor had his referee stag do in Marbella just a few days before the game PA:Press Association Kevin Friend also had a shocker, failing to spot two appalling acts of violence 
But Clarets boss Dyche said of Taylor: “He’s human, isn’t he? 
“I think people should be able to live a life outside of football. Unless there’s a rule that I don’t know about.” 
Taylor was booed by the home fans and Swansea chief Paul Clement, whose side won 3-2, revealed: “The ref said he had made an honest decision. Referee error as penalty is given to Burnley after a hand ball by Burnley player Sam Vokes Reuters Kevin Friend failed to send off Tyrone Mings and Zlatan Ibrahimovic on Saturday 
"But I realised 30 seconds afterwards it was Vokes’ hand. 
“I feel for refs. I referee training games and sometimes I just guess. 
"It’s bizarre they are the only people in the stadium who don’t have the benefit of technology.” Tyrone Mings stamps on Zlatan Ibrahimovic who then Elbows him in revenge RELATED STORIES GRUDGE MATCH LIVE - Post fight reaction as Tony Bellew pulls off shock victory over David Haye who suffered an Achilles injury the haye breaker Underdog Tony Bellew beats crocked David Haye with brutal 11th round TKO to settle bitter feud at O2 Arena 'PULL HIM OUT' David Haye had right ankle wrapped in rudimentary strapping after picking up injury against Tony Bellew as his Achilles gave way in the ring MONEY TO BURN Boxing legend Floyd 'Money' Mayweather's van TORCHED on Birmingham street while he holds meet and greet with fans on UK tour ACHE AND PAINS David Haye escapes surgery on damaged Achilles after losing to Tony Bellew in blockbuster fight 'Bottled it' Zlatan Ibrahimovic faces lengthy ban for elbowing Tyrone Mings after he STAMPED on striker's head during Man United's clash with Bournemouth ALEXITS Alexis Sanchez set for Arsenal summer exit after series of blazing rows with Arsene Wenger led to him being benched at Liverpool BEAUTY AND THE BEATS Sky Sports' stunning new face of boxing Anna Woolhouse sends Twitter into meltdown All deals are lof Victor Lindelof snubs Manchester United by signing new deal with Portuguese side Benfica packing a punch David Allen has the crowd, and his opponent, in stitches as he attends boxing weigh-in with something stuffed down his boxers a lotta haye-t When is David Haye vs Tony Bellew, what TV channel is it on and what are the latest odds?
